content: To the Chief Musician; on stringed instruments.  of David.
From the end of the earth I call to You, when my heart is overwhelmed  weak;
Lead me to the rock that is higher than I [a rock that is too high to reach without Your help].
For You have been a shelter  a refuge for me,
A strong tower against the enemy.
Let me dwell in Your tent forever;
Let me take refuge in the shelter of Your wings.
